com.intland.codebeamer.manager

Class TrackerItemNotificationManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intland.codebeamer.manager.TrackerItemNotificationManager

  • public class TrackerItemNotificationManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manager class collecting the users who will be notified when a TrackerItem changes, also collects the reasons for notifications.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReason
      Enumeration for the reasons why an user is notified
      static class  TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReasonsMap
      A bit smarter container (Map) for notification reasons.

      TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReasonsMap collectTrackerItemNotifees(TrackerItemDto trackerItem, java.lang.Integer event)

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static final TrackerItemNotificationManager getInstance()

      • collectTrackerItemNotifees

        public TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReasonsMap collectTrackerItemNotifees(TrackerItemDto trackerItem,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer event)
        Return all users will be notified for the specified tracker item:
        • a user can subscribe one particular item or a whole tracker (what is equivalent with subscribing all its items)
        • a role can be subscribed to one particular item or a whole tracker
        • submitter, assignees and supervisors of the given item will be notified, too
        Parameters:
        trackerItem - The trackerItem to collect notifications for
        event - one (or the logical OR) of {TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ISSUE, TrackerNotificationDto.UPDATE_ISSUE, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_COMMENT, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ATTACHMENT, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ASSOCIATION}, or null (any event)
        Returns:
        a Map for each users, with the notification reasons @link {NotificationReason} as values

      • collectTrackerItemNotifees

        public TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReasonsMap collectTrackerItemNotifees(TrackerItemDto trackerItem,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer event,
                                                                               TrackerItemUpdateDto changes)
        Return all users will be notified for the specified tracker item:
        • a user can subscribe one particular item or a whole tracker (what is equivalent with subscribing all its items)
        • a role can be subscribed to one particular item or a whole tracker
        • submitter, assignees and supervisors of the given item will be notified, too
        Parameters:
        trackerItem - The trackerItem to collect notifications for
        event - one (or the logical OR) of {TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ISSUE, TrackerNotificationDto.UPDATE_ISSUE, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_COMMENT, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ATTACHMENT, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ASSOCIATION}, or null (any event)
        changes - are the tracker item changes (if event is TrackerNotificationDto.UPDATE_ISSUE), otherwise null
        Returns:
        a Map for each users, with the notification reasons @link {NotificationReason} as values

      • collectTrackerItemNotifees

        public TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReasonsMap collectTrackerItemNotifees(TrackerItemDto trackerItem,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer event,
                                                                               java.util.Set<TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReason> filterForReasons)
        Return all users will be notified for the specified tracker item:
        • a user can subscribe one particular item or a whole tracker (what is equivalent with subscribing all its items)
        • a role can be subscribed to one particular item or a whole tracker
        • submitter, assignees and supervisors of the given item will be notified, too
        Parameters:
        trackerItem - The trackerItem to collect notifications for
        event - one (or the logical OR) of {TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ISSUE, TrackerNotificationDto.UPDATE_ISSUE, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_COMMENT, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ATTACHMENT, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ASSOCIATION}, or null (any event)
        filterForReasons - Collect only reasons of this type. If null then all/any reasons but PROJECT_ADMIN are collected.
        Returns:
        a Map for each users, with the notification reasons @link {NotificationReason} as values

      • collectTrackerItemNotifees

        public TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReasonsMap collectTrackerItemNotifees(TrackerItemDto trackerItem,
                                                                               TrackerItemEscalationRuleDto escalation)
        Return all users will be notified for the specified tracker item escalation:
        • a user can subscribe one particular item or a whole tracker (what is equivalent with subscribing all its items)
        • a role can be subscribed to one particular item or a whole tracker
        • submitter, assignees and supervisors of the given item will be notified, too
        Parameters:
        trackerItem - The trackerItem to collect notifications for
        escalation - Collect only reasons for the audience of this escalation
        Returns:
        a Map for each users, with the notification reasons @link {NotificationReason} as values

      • collectTrackerItemNotifees

        protected TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReasonsMap collectTrackerItemNotifees(TrackerItemDto trackerItem,
                                                                               java.lang.Integer event,
                                                                               java.util.Set<TrackerItemNotificationManager.NotificationReason> filterForReasons,
                                                                               TrackerItemEscalationRuleDto escalation,
                                                                               TrackerItemUpdateDto changes)
        Return all users will be notified for the specified tracker item:
        • a user can subscribe one particular item or a whole tracker (what is equivalent with subscribing all its items)
        • a role can be subscribed to one particular item or a whole tracker
        • submitter, assignees and supervisors of the given item will be notified, too
        Parameters:
        trackerItem - The trackerItem to collect notifications for
        event - one (or the logical OR) of {TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ISSUE, TrackerNotificationDto.UPDATE_ISSUE, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_COMMENT, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ATTACHMENT, TrackerNotificationDto.NEW_ASSOCIATION}, or null (any event)
        filterForReasons - Collect only reasons of this type. If null then all/any reasons but PROJECT_ADMIN are collected.
        changes - are the tracker item changes (if event is TrackerNotificationDto.UPDATE_ISSUE), otherwise null
        Returns:
        a Map for each users, with the notification reasons @link {NotificationReason} as values

        protected java.util.Set<UserDto> aclNotificationFilter(java.util.Set<UserDto> users,
